subject: Re: [junit] Problem accessing static methods
msgSnippet: ... Can you test the second class on its own with JUnit? If not, then there is your problem. If so, then I d need to see code to be able to offer more advice.
messageBody:
subhash jose wrote:

> I am trying to write junits for a class which access a static
> method of another class. I am getting static initialization error and
> the test case fails, though the functionality is correct.

Can you test the second class on its own with JUnit? If not, then there
is your problem. If so, then I'd need to see code to be able to offer
more advice.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
